text: 5 in 1 is an outdoor 1973–1974 painted CorTen steel sculpture by Tony Rosenthal (1914–2009), installed at 1 Police Plaza in Lower Manhattan, New York. ==See also== * 1974 in art * Plop art ==References== Category:1974 establishments in New York (state) Category:1974 sculptures Category:Outdoor sculptures in Manhattan Category:Sculptures by Tony Rosenthal Category:Steel sculptures in New York City
title: 5 in 1
